sent.orig: The year1923 was the most recent occasion the Glasgow side played Chelsea on our home turf.
sent.trans: 最近一次到切尔西主场的是1923年时的格拉斯哥流浪者队。

sent.orig: Benitez thinks the occasion could boost Gerrard's confidence-benefiting both club and country.
sent.trans: 老贝认为这将会提高杰拉德的自信，国家队和俱乐部都将会从中受益。

sent.orig: On the two occasion I have met him he was blind to the world.
sent.trans: 我碰上他的那两次，他都醉得不省人事。

sent.orig: The occasion for the citywide shutdown was an event most expect never to see again.
sent.trans: 像这样全市性停工的情况是大部分人从没有意料到的。

sent.orig: On this occasion, I would like to brief you on the upcoming China Hi-tech Fair.
sent.trans: 借此机会，我向大家简要介绍一下将要举办的“中国国际高新技术成果交易会”的有关情况。
